scripts.deploy: shx rm -rf build/deploy/products && shx rm -rf build/deploy/public && shx rm -rf build/deploy/client && lerna run deploy --parallel --ignore @docspace/common --ignore @docspace/components --ignore @docspace/browserslist-config-asc && shx cp -r public build/deploy && node build/scripts/minify-common-locales.js
scripts.deploy:personal: shx rm -rf build/deploy/products && shx rm -rf build/deploy/public && shx rm -rf build/deploy/client && lerna run deploy --parallel --scope {@docspace/client,@docspace/people,@docspace/files,@docspace/editor} && shx cp -r public build/deploy && node build/scripts/minify-common-locales.js
scripts.sw-build: workbox injectManifest config/workbox-config.js && yarn sw-modify && yarn sw-minimize
scripts.sw-build:personal: workbox injectManifest config/workbox-config.js && yarn sw-modify:personal && yarn sw-minimize
scripts.sw-modify: yarn sw-files-replace && yarn sw-files-editor-replace && yarn sw-people-replace && yarn sw-studio-replace && yarn sw-studio-login-replace && yarn sw-public-replace
scripts.sw-modify:personal: yarn sw-files-replace && yarn sw-files-editor-replace && yarn sw-people-replace && yarn sw-studio-replace && yarn sw-public-replace
scripts.wipe: shx rm -rf node_modules yarn.lock web/**/node_modules products/**/node_modules
scripts.e2e.test:sequential: yarn workspace @docspace/people test:sequential && yarn workspace @docspace/files test:sequential && yarn workspace @docspace/login test:sequential
scripts.e2e.test:model: yarn workspace @docspace/people test:model && yarn workspace @docspace/files test:model && yarn workspace @docspace/login test:model
scripts.e2e.test:translation: lerna run test:translation:model --parallel --scope {@docspace/people,@docspace/files}  && lerna run test:translation --parallel --scope {@docspace/people,@docspace/files}
scripts.e2e.test:translation:personal: lerna run test:translation:model:personal --parallel --scope {@docspace/people,@docspace/files}  && lerna run test:translation:personal --parallel --scope {@docspace/people,@docspace/files}
